queries.querystring: select distinct r.*,count(v.dbn_repv_viewname) Views_Used, min(e.Ref_Status) Extr_Status from dbn_report r, dbn_report_views v, dbn_entities e where (v.dbn_repv_viewname = e.ViewName) and (v.dbn_repv_parid = r.dbn_rep_id) and r.dbn_rep_id ='pRID'

Select concat('MRN_SPE09#05##',md.NSN,'#1#',md.NSN) '______DocID_____' , concat('MRN_SPE01#ADOC&arg1=',md.nsn) ILIAS , md.document , md.title , md.type , if(md.usable='Y','MRN_SPE03#F04#Y','MRN_SPE03#F15#N') as 'Usable' , md.keyword , md.comments
, mdf.function
, if (md.replaced_by_id=null, true, concat('MRN_SPE09#05##',md2.NSN,'#1#',md2.NSN)) '____NewDoc____'
, concat('MRN_SPE09#01##',ma.man_org,'#0#',ma.man_org) 'MatMan' , if (left(md.nsn,4)='7610',concat('MRN_SPE20#file:\\\\\\G:\\CIDMat\\Tech Bib Defense\\index\\',md.nsn,'.HTML#_blank#8#','OpenDoc'),'N/A') 'DocLink' from mrqr_documents md inner join mrqr_nsn mn on md.nsn=mn.nsn and md.nsn like '7610-%' inner join mrqr_macodes ma on mn.macode=ma.macode and md.nsn like '7610-%'
left join mrqr_documents md2 on md2.doc_id=md.replaced_by_id
left join mrqr_documents_function mdf on md.doc_id=mdf.doc_id
where if ('pTITLE'='',true, md.title like 'pTITLE') and if ('pNSN'='',true, md.NSN like 'pNSN') and if ('pMATMAN'='',true, ma.man_org like 'pMATMAN') and if ('pKEYWORDS'='',true, md.keyword like 'pKEYWORDS') and if ('pDOCUMENT'='',true, md.document like 'pDOCUMENT') and IF('pSHOWUNUSABLE'='on',true,md.usable='Y')
and if ('pFUNCTION'='',true, mdf.function like 'pFUNCTION')
and (length(replace(replace('pNSN','%',''),'_',''))>=6 OR length(replace(replace('pTITLE','%',''),'_',''))>=2 OR length(replace(replace('pMATMAN','%',''),'_',''))>=1 OR length(replace(replace('pFUNCTION','%',''),'_',''))>=4 )
order by md.NSN
